tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id INT,
    consumption_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    consumption_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_meter_id FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES smart_meters(meter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE smart_meters(
    meter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_time TIME,
    power_usage_kwh FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE locations(
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    street_address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption(
    meter_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_time TIME,
    power_usage_kwh FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (meter_id, usage_date, usage_time)
);

CREATE TABLE meters (
    meter_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    installation_date DATE,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
    is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE power_consumption (
    consumption_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id INT,
    reading_time TIMESTAMP,
    consumption DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES meters(meter_id)
);
